title.rendered: Science Courses and Requirements for Students in York University

content.rendered:
science courses and requirements for students who want to apply to the 2024 academic session at the University of York programs of study, and How to apply.

YORK UNIVERSITY
Future Students: The below information provides the admission requirement and some courses for students who wish to study at York University. we have worked to provide you with all course requirements and we as well wish you success.
Below is the list of science courses and requirements for students who want to apply to the 2024 academic session at the University of York
• Programs of Study
• Admission Requirements
• Transfer Credit
• Scholarships & Tuition
• APPLY
• CONTACT
Note: To apply for any of the following courses you must have your Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD).
Biochemistry – BSc
Requirements for admission
• ENG 4U
• SBI 4U
• SCH 4U
• MH F4U
• MCV 4U
• with at least one additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) below:
• SPH 4U
In other to gain admission into this program, your academic average must be in the low-to-mid 80s.
OUAC code YSF
Faculty of Science
Biology – BSc
Requirements for admission:
• ENG4U
• SBI4U
• SCH4U
• MHF4U
• with two additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) below:
• SPH4U
To gain admission to this program, your academic average should be in the low-to-mid 80s.
OUAC code YSB
Faculty of Science

Biology / Biologie – BSc
Requirements for admission:
• Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD)
• ENG4U or FRA4U
• SBI4U
• SCH4U
• MHF4U
• at least two additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) below:
• SPH4U
• 4U French
In other to gain admission to this program, your academic average should be in the low-to-mid 80s.
OUAC code YYF
This is the Faculty of Science

Biomedical Science – BSc
Requirements for admission:
• Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD)
• ENG4U
• SBI4U

• MHF4U
• At least two additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) below:
• SPH4U
In other to gain admission to this program, your academic average must be in the low-to-mid 80s.
OUAC code YSW
Faculty of Science

Biophysics – BSc
Requirements for admission:
• Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD)
• ENG4U
• SBI4U
• SPH4U
• MHF4U
• MCV4U
• at least one additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) below:
• SCH4U
In other to gain admission to this program, your academic average must be in the high 70s to mid-80s.
OUAC code YPT
Faculty of Science

Biotechnology – BSc
Requirements for admission:
• Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD)
• ENG4U
• SBI4U
• SCH4U
• MHF4U
• At least two additional 4U or M courses – recommendation(s) be
SPH4U To gain admission to this program, your academic average must be in the low-to-mid 80s.
OUAC code YSA
Liberal Arts & Professional Studies

The above information Is for those who want to apply for any science courses at York University

to clear your worries click Ontario Universities Application Centre
